name: Fighter Traighter
description:
Fighter Traighter was created by a team of 10 university students at UCM, Madrid named Moruyankii Fighter:

  • Amparo Rubio Bellón 
  • Anass Carreau Allagui
  • Andrés de la Cuesta López 
  • Daniel Cortijo Gamboa
  • Eloy Moreno Cortijo 
  • Pedro Pablo Cubells Talavera 
  • Pablo Rodríguez Bobada García Muñoz 
  • Raúl Blas Ruiz 
  • Sebastián Sánchez-Hombría 
  • Sergio Alberto Luis Cano

An arcade fighter game where you have to beat your opponent by abilitys and attacks (these abilitys are obtained hitting a punching bag previously).

This project is open source so you can check the code in this repository
